import React,{useState} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; const Register = () => { const[inputs,setInputs] = useState({}); const inputHandler = (e)=>{ console.log("onchange"); setInputs({ ...inputs,[e.target.name]: e.target.value }) console.log(inputs); } const submitHandler = (e)=>{ console.log("onsubmit"); axios.post("http://localhost:3000/api/signup") .then((response)=>{ }) .cat } return (

) } export default Register
